|brand = Compal Broadband Networks |model = CH7465 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = LG-LC |revision = 5.01 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = O2U-AP7465 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1417465200000 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;DHCE2652; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8365MB; |cm_down_c = 24 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:22:05 |oui = AC:22:05
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;3.x;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, VoIP, |addchip = eMMC NAND Controller;PHISON;PS8211;PS8211-0, PHISON UO1719C, S7117EE;1;,,, Dual Channel miSLIC VoIP Chip;Microsemi;Le9662WQC;;1;,,, 24-Channel Digital Cable Front End;MaxLinear;MxL267D;MxL267D, K36M3.01, 1719 CC;1;,,, Cable Modem Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX3521;MAXIM, 3521E, TP721, +NECP;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1<!-- 192.168.100.1 --> |defaultlogin = randomly generated |defaultpass = randomly generated |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = CH7465 |manuf_rev = CE |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Connect Box, UPC (EU), |fccapprovdate = 02/27/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 4715309381120 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Celeno;CL242; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Celeno;CL2330; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''This device is known as Connect Box, distributed by UPC (Liberty Global) within Europe.'' :[https://www.upc.ch/pdf/support/manuals/en/internet/ConnectBox/connect-box-manual.pdf User Manual]
"P/N: 1417465200000" and "MODEL: CH7465CE" is silkscreened on the board (OEM: [[Arcadyan]])
The default SSID and credentials are printed on a sticker on the router's chassis. :The format is not known and will probably depend on the target market / rebrand type.
DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 ({{Approved by service|Connect Box (UPC)}})
*{{WiFiCert|WFA65642|13/05/2016}}
[https://github.com/fabaff/python-connect-box Python Client] for interacting with the cable modem/router ''CH7465LG'' which is provided under different names by various ISP in Europe... *'''UPC''' Connect Box *'''Ziggo''' Connect Box (NL) *'''Unitymedia''' Connect Box (DE) *'''Irish''' Virgin Media Super Hub 3.0
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31540404-PUMA-6-Modems-to-Avoid ''PUMA 6 - Modems to Avoid'' on '''DSLReports''' forums] *[https://forum.upc.eu/t5/connectbox/test-puma6-i-problemy/m-p/843#M37 ''PUMA 6 - Test and problems'' on '''UPC''' forums] (PL) :(''Official Polish Community Forum'') *[https://forum.mediaswiat.pl/viewtopic.php?t=9766 ''PUMA 6 - Network latency issue'' on '''Mediaswiat''' forums] (PL) :(''Unofficial Polish Community Forum'')
==Pictures== <center>'''[[User:Zuzia|Zuzia]]'s Images''' <gallery> File:Front leds.jpg|Front LEDs File:Front leds lowres.jpg|Front LEDs File:Back.jpg|Back File:PCB top1.jpg|PCB top File:PCB top with radiator .jpg|PCB top with radiator File:WIFI.jpg|WiFi File:Chipsets.jpg|Chipsets File:CPU_PUMA.jpg|Intel Puma 6 File:DOCSIS.jpg|DOCSIS File:PCB bottom.jpg|PCB bottom File:PCB bottom in case v2.jpg|PCB bottom in case File:Lock case.jpg|Lockable box File:Power supply.jpg|Power supply File:WIFI ANTENNAS.jpg|WiFi Antennas </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]]
==Notes== ===Specifications=== *DOCSIS 3.0 and EuroDOCSIS 3.0 compliant, 24Ã—8 channel bonding *2.4GHz and 5GHz radio for wireless 802.11abgn/ac connectivity *Wireless function supports Wi-Fi 2.4/5GHz Dual-band mode *Four 10/100/1000 Base-T Ethernet uplink ports *VoIP Internet telephone connections, Two RJ-11 voice ports *1GHz Full band capture, supports IPv4/IPv6, Low-power consumption
==See also== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] â€¢ [[Intel Puma]] â€¢ [[Celeno]] *[[Compal Broadband Networks CH7465CE]] - DOCSIS 3.0 *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 3]] - [[Arris]] VMDG505 / TG2492LG
